author: costin
msg: mod_jk2 will use a different syntax and a single config file, and for
mod_jk1 the original config in 3.3 and 4.0 are good enough

author: costin
msg: Remove the dependency on compat. Now tomcat3 coyote adapter depends only
( of course it depends on tomca3 core, but not on impl. classes )

author: costin
msg: Added the second ( unused ) param to doRead/doWrite.
The param is needed only if stateless impl. of Input/OutputBuffer are

author: remm
msg: - Add some code to prevent problems when calling finish or commit twice.

author: costin
msg: Add the second param in calling.
The tomcat3 and 4 adapters are calling the request and response methods, it
doesn't seem to be any other place to depend on this ( except the impl )
